titleStmt.title: A Letter to a friend in the country concerning the use of instrumental musick in the worship of God in answer to Mr. Newte's sermon preach'd at Tiverton in Devon on the occasion of an organ being erected in that parish-church.
titleStmt.author: Newte, John, 1655?-1716. Lawfulness and use of organs in the Christian Church.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
